Class Score

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.Actor
      Score

public class Score
extends greenfoot.Actor

Class Score provides a visual score count of bananas eaten. Player needs to eat 5 bananas to win.

Version:
(2.0)

(Benjamin Presley)
